verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> which came to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> from <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> when <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and all his <S%H2428>army,<s%> and all the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> that were under his <S%H3027>dominion,<s%> and all the <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> were <S%H3898>fighting<s%> against <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and against all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H559>it,<s%> saying:

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H1980>Go,<s%> and <S%H559>speak<s%> to <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H559>him,<s%> Thus says <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H5414>Behold,<s%> I will give this <S%H5892>city<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and he shall <S%H8313>burn<s%> it with <S%H784>fire:<s%>

and you shall not escape <S%H4422>out<s%> of his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> but shall <S%H8610>surely<s%> be <S%H8610>taken,<s%> and <S%H5414>delivered<s%> into his <S%H3027>hand;<s%> and your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and he shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> with you <S%H6310>mouth<s%> to <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and you shall <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>

Yet <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> O <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah:<s%> thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> concerning <S%H4191>you,<s%> You shall not die by the <S%H2719>sword;<s%>

you shall <S%H4191>die<s%> in <S%H7965>peace;<s%> and with the <S%H4955>burnings<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> who were <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H8313>you,<s%> so shall they make a burning for <S%H5594>you;<s%> and they shall lament <S%H1945>you,<s%> saying, Ah <S%H113>Lord!<s%> for I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> the <S%H1697>word,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
Then <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> all these <S%H1697>words<s%> to <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%>

when the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>'s <S%H2428>army<s%> was <S%H3898>fighting<s%> against <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and against all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> that were <S%H3498>left,<s%> against <S%H3923>Lachish<s%> and against <S%H5825>Azekah;<s%> for these alone <S%H7604>remained<s%> of the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> as <S%H4013>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%>

The <S%H1697>word<s%> that came to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> from <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> that the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> had <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with all the <S%H5971>people<s%> who were at <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> to <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> liberty to <S%H1865>them;<s%>

that every <S%H376>man<s%> should let his <S%H5650>male<s%> <S%H376>servant,<s%> and every man his <S%H8198>female<s%> <S%H5680>servant,<s%> who is a Hebrew or a <S%H5680>Hebrewess,<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%> <S%H2670>free;<s%> that none should make <S%H5647>bondservants<s%> of <S%H3064>them,<s%> of a Jew his <S%H251>brother.<s%>

All the <S%H8269>princes<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H935>obeyed,<s%> who had entered into the <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> that <S%H376>everyone<s%> should let his <S%H5650>male<s%> <S%H376>servant,<s%> and everyone his <S%H8198>female<s%> <S%H7971>servant,<s%> go <S%H2670>free,<s%> that none should make <S%H5647>bondservants<s%> of them any <S%H8085>more;<s%> they obeyed, and let them <S%H7971>go:<s%>

but <S%H310>afterwards<s%> they <S%H7725>turned,<s%> and caused the <S%H5650>servants<s%> and the <S%H8198>handmaids,<s%> whom they had let <S%H7971>go<s%> <S%H2670>free,<s%> to <S%H7725>return,<s%> and brought them into <S%H3533>subjection<s%> for <S%H5650>servants<s%> and for <S%H8198>handmaids.<s%>
Therefore the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> from <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> I <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with your <S%H1>fathers<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I brought them <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5650>bondage,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

At the <S%H7093>end<s%> of <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> you shall let <S%H7971>go<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%> who is a <S%H5680>Hebrew,<s%> who has been <S%H4376>sold<s%> to <S%H5647>you,<s%> and has served you <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> you shall let him <S%H7971>go<s%> <S%H2670>free<s%> from <S%H1>you:<s%> but your fathers <S%H8085>didn't<s%> listen to <S%H5186>me,<s%> neither inclined their <S%H241>ear.<s%>

You had <S%H3117>now<s%> <S%H7725>turned,<s%> and had <S%H6213>done<s%> that which is <S%H3477>right<s%> in my <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> in <S%H7121>proclaiming<s%> <S%H1865>liberty<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H7453>neighbor;<s%> and you had <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me in the <S%H1004>house<s%> which is <S%H7121>called<s%> by my <S%H8034>name:<s%>

but you <S%H7725>turned<s%> and <S%H2490>profaned<s%> my <S%H8034>name,<s%> and caused every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H5650>servant,<s%> and every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H8198>handmaid,<s%> whom you had <S%H7971>let<s%> go <S%H2670>free<s%> at their <S%H5315>pleasure,<s%> to <S%H7725>return;<s%> and you brought them into <S%H3533>subjection,<s%> to be to you for <S%H5650>servants<s%> and for <S%H8198>handmaids.<s%>

Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> you have not <S%H8085>listened<s%> to <S%H7121>me,<s%> to proclaim <S%H1865>liberty,<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H251>brother,<s%> and every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H7453>neighbor:<s%> <S%H7121>behold,<s%> I proclaim to you a <S%H1865>liberty,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> to the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> to the <S%H1698>pestilence,<s%> and to the <S%H7458>famine;<s%> and I will <S%H5414>make<s%> you to be <S%H2189>tossed<s%> back and forth among all the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

I will <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> who have <S%H5674>transgressed<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> who have not <S%H6965>performed<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> which they <S%H3772>made<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3772>me,<s%> when they cut the <S%H5695>calf<s%> in <S%H8147>two<s%> and <S%H5674>passed<s%> between its <S%H1335>parts;<s%>

the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> the <S%H5631>eunuchs,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> who <S%H5674>passed<s%> between the <S%H1335>parts<s%> of the <S%H5695>calf;<s%>

I will even <S%H5414>give<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of their <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of those who <S%H1245>seek<s%> their <S%H5315>life;<s%> and their dead <S%H5038>bodies<s%> shall be for <S%H3978>food<s%> to the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and to the <S%H929>animals<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

<S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and his <S%H8269>princes<s%> will I <S%H5414>give<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of their <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of those who <S%H1245>seek<s%> their <S%H5315>life,<s%> and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>'s <S%H2428>army,<s%> who have gone away from <S%H5927>you.<s%>

<S%H6680>Behold,<s%> I will command, <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and cause them to <S%H7725>return<s%> to this <S%H5892>city;<s%> and they shall <S%H3898>fight<s%> against <S%H3920>it,<s%> and take <S%H8313>it,<s%> and burn it with <S%H784>fire:<s%> and I will <S%H5414>make<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> a <S%H8077>desolation,<s%> without <S%H3427>inhabitant.<s%>
